channel.title: Im Trying To Make a command to raise my combat lvl
channel.description:
it wont work but would it does if i say ::combat playername LVL
it would be like ::combat dff280 999 so my combat would be 999 Any help?

item.title: Im Trying To Make a command to raise my combat lvl
item.dc:creator: @de_dust89 de dust89
item.description:
@de_dust89 wrote:

if(command.startsWith("combat") && playerRights > 2){
int combat = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(7));
extraCb = combat;
updateRequired = true;
appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
}

just type ::combat 48
and you will be lvl 48 until you relog.

Read full topic
item.source: Im Trying To Make a command to raise my combat lvl

item.title: Im Trying To Make a command to raise my combat lvl
item.dc:creator: @KempiScape KempiScape
item.description:
@KempiScape wrote:

[quote=“dff280, post:1, topic:309334”]it wont work but would it does if i say ::combat playername LVL

it would be like ::combat dff280 999
so my combat would be 999 Any help?[/quote] like something addxp ? to player?

Read full topic
item.source: Im Trying To Make a command to raise my combat lvl

item.title: Im Trying To Make a command to raise my combat lvl
item.dc:creator: @jeddac jeddac
item.description:
@jeddac wrote:

[quote=“Siccc, post:4, topic:309334”]They are rong.

But you cant do it by players name.

::combat 0 or any other number…

} if(command.startsWith("combat") && playerRights > 2){ int combat = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(7)); extraCb += combat; updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; }

EDIT
To maybe clear up some confusion.
This does not save your combat level.
You will have to type this command every time you login to change your combat.[/quote]

}
if(command.startsWith(“combat”) && playerRights > 2){
int combat = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(7));
extraCb += combat;
updateRequired = true;
appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
}

yep, exactly the same as what i have, works fine

Read full topic
item.source: Im Trying To Make a command to raise my combat lvl

item.title: Im Trying To Make a command to raise my combat lvl
item.dc:creator: @Telenim Telenim
item.description:
@Telenim wrote:

[quote=“revengr, post:3, topic:309334”]I don’t think you can directly edit your combat level through a command.
Let alone going through your character file.
Your combat level is entirely based off of your combat stats, and cannot be changed otherwise.[/quote]It can

Read full topic
item.source: Im Trying To Make a command to raise my combat lvl

item.title: Im Trying To Make a command to raise my combat lvl
item.dc:creator: @Siccc Siccc
item.description:
@Siccc wrote:

They are rong.

But you cant do it by players name.

::combat 0 or any other number…

} if(command.startsWith("combat") && playerRights > 2){ int combat = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(7)); extraCb += combat; updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; }

EDIT
To maybe clear up some confusion.
This does not save your combat level.
You will have to type this command every time you login to change your combat.

Read full topic
item.source: Im Trying To Make a command to raise my combat lvl

item.title: Im Trying To Make a command to raise my combat lvl
item.dc:creator: @revengr revengr
item.description:
@revengr wrote:

I don’t think you can directly edit your combat level through a command.
Let alone going through your character file.
Your combat level is entirely based off of your combat stats, and cannot be changed otherwise.

Read full topic
